reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The project includes the village development programme implemented by local NGO network (Tanintharyi Karen Peace Support Initiative TKPSI) and support activities by Norwegian People's Aid.The immediate objective of the project is to support the recovery ef forts of the IDPs in the two pilot project areas and thus support peace process in Myanmar. On the political level the aim is to support the over-arching peace process between Myanmar's government and the KNU by creating traction on the ground - thus incr easing the confidence in the political process. The project is also a space-increasing exercise aiming at widening the humanitarian space by spearheading relief and development efforts in areas which for decades have been inaccessible to both national and international organizations (see Annex III: principles for inventions). Moreover the project aims to assist the so-called convergence process in which border-based organizations are helped to a) re-establish themselves inside the country, and b) link up wi th local organizations on the inside.
